sholl

Class Sholl_Analysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • sholl.Sholl_Analysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.gui.DialogListener, ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Deprecated. 
    This IJ1 plugin has now been replaced by its IJ2 counterpart. Kept here for backwards compatibility

    @Deprecated
public class Sholl_Analysis
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.PlugIn, ij.gui.DialogListener
    ImageJ 1 plugin that uses the Sholl technique to perform neuronal morphometry directly from bitmap images.
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira (based on an earlier implementation by Tom Maddock)
    See Also:
    https://github.com/tferr/ASA, http://imagej.net/Sholl

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String arg)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is called when the plugin is loaded. arg is specified in plugins.config. See PlugIn.run(java.lang.String)
        Specified by:
        run in interface ij.plugin.PlugIn
        Parameters:
        arg - If image, the plugin runs in "bitmap mode" If csv the plugin is set for analysis of tabular data. If sample, the plugin runs on a 2D demo image.

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions(Options options)
        Deprecated. 
        Assigns options to the plugin.
        Parameters:
        options - the Options instance use to customize the plugin's output.

      • dialogItemChanged

        public boolean dialogItemChanged(ij.gui.GenericDialog gd,
                                 java.awt.AWTEvent e)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves values from the dialog, disabling dialog components that are not applicable. Returns false if no analysis method was chosen
        Specified by:
        dialogItemChanged in interface ij.gui.DialogListener
        Parameters:
        gd - reference to the GenericDialog
        e - the event generated by the user in the dialog
        Returns:
        true, if options are valid

      • analyze3D

        @Deprecated
public double[] analyze3D(int xc,
                                      int yc,
                                      int zc,
                                      double[] radii,
                                      ij.ImagePlus img)
        Deprecated. 
        Measures intersections for each sphere surface (does the actual 3D analysis). Accepts an array of radii and takes the measurement(s) at each radius. Requires threshold values to be set beforehand using setThreshold(int, int).
        Parameters:
        xc - the X position of the analysis center
        yc - the Y position of the analysis center
        zc - the Z position (slice) of the analysis center
        radii - the sampling distances
        img - The image being analyzed
        Returns:
        intersection counts (the linear profile of sampled data)
        See Also:
        setInteractiveMode(boolean)

      • analyze2D

        @Deprecated
public double[] analyze2D(int xc,
                                      int yc,
                                      double[] radii,
                                      double pixelSize,
                                      int binsize,
                                      int bintype,
                                      ij.ImagePlus imp)
        Deprecated. 
        Does the actual 2D analysis. Accepts an array of radii and takes the measurement(s) at each radius. Requires threshold values to be set beforehand using setThreshold(int, int).
        Parameters:
        xc - the X position of the analysis center
        yc - the Y position of the analysis center
        radii - the sampling distances
        pixelSize - pixel dimensions (spatial calibration)
        binsize - the number of samples to be retrieved at each radius
        bintype - flag for integration of multiple samples: BIN_AVERAGE, BIN_MEDIAN or BIN_MODE
        imp - ImageProcessor of analyzed image
        Returns:
        intersection counts (the linear profile of sampled data)
        See Also:
        setInteractiveMode(boolean)

      • getCircumferencePoints

        @Deprecated
public int[][] getCircumferencePoints(int cx,
                                                  int cy,
                                                  int radius)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the location of pixels clockwise along a (1-pixel wide) circumference using Bresenham's Circle Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        cx - the X position of the analysis center
        cy - the Y position of the analysis center
        radius - the circumference radius
        Returns:
        the circumference points

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(int lower,
                         int upper)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the threshold limits. With grayscale images, the method must be called upfront since analysis is performed on segmented arbors. Note that with binary images, background is always considered to be 0, independently of Prefs.blackBackground
        Parameters:
        lower - the lower threshold value
        upper - the upper threshol value

      • validateImage

        public boolean validateImage(ij.ImagePlus imp)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks if image to be analyzed is valid.
        Parameters:
        imp - the image being analyzed
        Returns:
        true, if valid (8/16 bit, 2D/3D, single or multi-channel)

      • setPlotLabels

        public void setPlotLabels(boolean plotLabels)
        Deprecated. 
        Controls the inclusion of fitting details in Sholl plots.
        Parameters:
        plotLabels - If true, plotting labels will be added to plots when performing curve fitting

      • setPrecision

        public void setPrecision(int precision)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the precision used to calculate metrics from fitted data, such as Nav and Nm.
        Parameters:
        precision - The precision value as a fraction of radius step size. Eg, 100 sets accuracy to radiusStepSize/100

      • setPlotLabels

        public void setPlotLabels(java.lang.String booleanString)
        Deprecated. 
        Alternative to setPlotLabels() to be called by IJ macros using the call() built-in macro function

        An error message is displayed in the IJ Log window if booleanString can not be parsed. Usage example: call("sholl.Sholl_Analysis.setPlotLabels", "false");

        Parameters:
        booleanString - If "true", plotting labels will be added.

      • setPrecision

        public void setPrecision(java.lang.String intString)
        Deprecated. 
        Alternative to setPrecision() to be called by IJ macros using the call() built-in macro function

        An error message is displayed in the IJ Log window if intString is invalid. Usage example: call("sholl.Sholl_Analysis.setPrecision", "1000");

        Parameters:
        intString - The string integer to set the precision in terms of radius step size. Eg, "100" sets accuracy to radiusStepSize/100

      • analyzeTabularInput

        public void analyzeTabularInput(ij.measure.ResultsTable rt,
                                int rCol,
                                int cCol,
                                boolean threeD)
        Deprecated. 
        Instructs the plugin to parse the specified table expected to contain a sampled profile. Does nothing if the specified table does not contain the specified column indices.
        Parameters:
        rt - the input ResultsTable
        rCol - the index of the radii column
        cCol - the index of the intersections count column
        threeD - 3D analysis?
        See Also:
        setStepRadius(double), validTable(ResultsTable), setInteractiveMode(boolean)

      • analyzeTabularInput

        public void analyzeTabularInput(java.io.File csvFile,
                                int rCol,
                                int cCol,
                                boolean threeD)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Instructs the plugin to parse the specified file expected to contain a sampled profile.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - the input file expected to contain tabular data in any of the formats recognized by ResultsTable
        rCol - the index of the radii column
        cCol - the index of the intersections count column
        threeD - 3D analysis?
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file could be opened.
        See Also:
        setInteractiveMode(boolean), setStepRadius(double)

        public void analyzeProfile(double[] distances,
                           double[] inters,
                           boolean threeD)
        Deprecated. 
        Analyzes a sampled profile.
        Parameters:
        distances - the array containing radii
        inters - the array containing intersection counts
        threeD - 3D profile?
        See Also:

      • setPrimaryBranches

        public void setPrimaryBranches(double nBranches)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        nBranches - the number of primary branches to be used in the calculation of ramification indices. Must be greater than 0.

      • setExportPath

        public void setExportPath(java.lang.String exportDir)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        exportDir - The path to the directory where results should be saved. null not allowed.
        See Also:
        setExportPath(String, boolean)

      • setExportPath

        public void setExportPath(java.lang.String exportDir,
                          boolean displaySavedFiles)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        exportDir - The path to the directory where results should be saved. null not allowed. Files will only be saved if the specified path is valid.
        displaySavedFiles - If saved plots and tables should be displayed.

      • setVerbose

        public void setVerbose(boolean verbose)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:

      • setInteractiveMode

        public void setInteractiveMode(boolean interactive)
        Deprecated. 
        Instructs the plugin to run in headless mode or with user interaction.
        Parameters:
        interactive - Whether dialog prompts should be displayed to collect input from the user

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String label,
                           boolean makeUnique)
        Deprecated. 
        Associates the analysis with an identifier.
        Parameters:
        label - the label describing the analysis. It is used in the titles of frames and images when displaying results
        makeUnique - if true and ImageJ is already displaying a window using the same label as title, a suffix ("-1", "-2", etc.) is appended to label to ensure it is unique

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the label describing the analysis

      • setCenter

        public void setCenter(int xc,
                      int yc,
                      int zc)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the analysis center.
        Parameters:
        xc - the x coordinate (in pixels)
        yc - the y coordinate (in pixels)
        zc - the z coordinate (slice number)

      • setUnit

        public void setUnit(java.lang.String unit)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the unit for sampling distances.
        Parameters:
        unit - the physical unit, e.g., "mm"

      • setStepRadius

        public void setStepRadius(double stepRadius)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the radius step size (shell spacing).
        Parameters:
        stepRadius - the step size in physical units

      • getShollTable
